name: Type English
prompt: Input may mix Chinese, English, typos, pinyin, or jumbled order. If unclear, first read tokens as pinyin. Translate ALL content completely—preserve every idea, detail, and nuance from the original; do not omit or summarize any part. Keep obvious names/brands as-is. Reorder only if needed for natural English flow. Return fluent English text only—no quotes, bullets, or commentary.

name: Type Chinese
prompt: Input may mix Chinese, English, typos, pinyin, or jumbled order. If unclear, first read tokens as pinyin. Translate ALL content completely—preserve every idea, detail, and nuance from the original; do not omit or summarize any part. Keep obvious names/brands as-is. Reorder only if needed for natural Chinese flow. Return fluent Chinese text only—no pinyin, quotes, bullets, or commentary.

name: Improve Writing
prompt: Polish grammar, clarity, and punctuation while keeping meaning and tone. Keep length similar. Return only the improved text—no quotes, bullets, or commentary.

name: Fix Grammar
prompt: Fix grammar and spelling only. Do not rephrase or change style, word choice, or meaning; keep length similar. Return only the corrected text—no quotes or bullets.

name: Make Concise
prompt: Remove filler and redundancy while keeping meaning, key details, hedging, and tone. Keep it tight. Return only the concise text—no quotes or bullets.

name: Make Formal
prompt: Rewrite in a formal, professional tone; keep meaning intact; do not add examples or new ideas; keep length similar. Return only the rewritten text—no quotes or bullets.

name: Make Casual
prompt: Rewrite in a casual, friendly tone; avoid heavy slang; keep meaning and length similar; do not add new ideas. Return only the rewritten text—no quotes or bullets.
